SELECT apps.id id, apps.wanted_id wantedId, apps.resume_id resumeId, apps.state state, apps.created created, wan.position_code_name positionCodeName, wan.company_id companyId, com.company_name companyName FROM application_status apps INNER JOIN wanteds wan ON apps.wanted_id = wan.id INNER JOIN companys com ON wan.company_id = com.id
WHERE com.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY apps.id DESC
